replies.msg: 今日所有FULL GEAR 會盡拉.. 會扣留48, 等佢地10月1出唔到嚟

Colleagues, telegram now appeal to PE MTR again. For tonight I would like to arrest those with full gear, detain 48 will eliminate them from 1/10. Those no gear let go in order to preserve our strength for the big day. Remind all on petrol bomb & fire safety.

quote.msg: 今日所有FULL GEAR 會盡拉.. 會扣留48, 等佢地10月1出唔到嚟

replies.msg:
請大家幫手傳，黑警內部出左statement
唔想有手足被拉，10.1一齊再出黎
